text: @stayceespeaks In the end. Covid-19 is going to end his presidency. There’s no path out now. Just wait until Flu season hits and Covid is still raging. He’ll go to prison for taxes and treason and obstruction. But covid is what’s getting him out of the WH. Let his cult rage on.
